name: Blue Spacey Tumblr Hell
description: A light pastel blue Tumblr dashboard theme with a spacey background that includes several tweaks and fixes to the GUI.
additional_info:
Version 1.0:

Some known bugs:
-New post editor has color problems
-Link on ask posts difficult to read until hovered when ask was sent by an actual user (not anonymous)

These will be fixed asap.
